title: Mobile Troubleshooting - Dropped Calls
description: A customer complains about frequently dropped calls in a specific location (e.g., their home).

tasks.description: Identify the customer and the specific address where calls are dropping.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer's account and logs the problem address.

tasks.description: Check the network coverage map and known issues for the reported location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds no known outages but notes the area has borderline coverage.

tasks.description: Instruct the customer to enable Wi-Fi Calling on their device as a solution.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions for enabling Wi-Fi Calling on iOS and Android.
